channel.title: Virtualisation on DistributedFog
channel.description: Recent content in Virtualisation on DistributedFog

item.title: Cisco IOx
item.description: IOx combines IoT application execution within the fog and offers highly secure connectivity with Cisco IOS technology, as well as powerful services for rapid, reliable integration with IoT sensors and the cloud. cisco.com Architecture cisco.com The Cisco IOx application environment combines IoT application execution within the fog; secure connectivity with Cisco IOS Software; and powerful services for rapid, reliable integration with Internet of Things (IoT) sensors and the cloud.

item.title: Cloudlet
item.description: A cloudlet is a mobility-enhanced small-scale cloud datacenter that is located at the edge of the Internet. The main purpose of the cloudlet is supporting resource-intensive and interactive mobile applications by providing powerful computing resources to mobile devices with lower latency. It is a new architectural element that extends todayâ€™s cloud computing infrastructure. Wikipedia Cloudlet VS Cloud There is significant overlap in the requirements for cloud and cloudlet.
